body: Here's a rough synopsis of the story to hold the curious over: Sister Amy is your average super gentle nun. She catches a shadowy figure doing something suspicious, which turns out to be a demon summoning. Her arrival interrupted the summoning (causing the summoner to run away) and she accidentally cut herself and dropped some blood on the summoning circle, binding the summoned demon (who turned out to be Satan himself) to her. He decides to live at the convent/orphanage under the alias Santa, but in order to keep his human form he has to have sex with her three times per day. Story hints that one of the other nuns knows about the demon summoning. Chapter 3 introduces an incubus that attempts to seduce Amy (though Satan comes to the rescue). I really want to see where this is going.
WaitinGo.. A good Manga between a nun and a demon. But I liked it for you to tell lies.
Cute NunXDemon manga, I'm expecting a tl to pick this and translate it in the near future
A long and good nun dedicated hentai. She's kind of petite even. A good change to that weird gyaru shit they tend to add to nuns as the story goes
